message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price that I'm sure you'll find reasonable. I'm thinking of starting at $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1500000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit on this sale.

I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $1250000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.
